label: uncl7491
comment: Code specifying a type of inventory.

values.label: Accepted product inventory
values.comment: Inventory of products accepted by control of incoming products.

values.label: Bonded inventory
values.comment: Inventory of products bonded for customs reasons.

values.label: Awaiting inspection inventory
values.comment: Inventory of products awaiting quality inspection.

values.label: Finished goods
values.comment: Inventory of products that are complete and ready for sale.

values.label: Maintenance, repair & operations (MRO)
values.comment: Inventory of itemsused within the manufactureof products, but without making up any part of a finished product.

values.label: Packing materials
values.comment: Inventory of anything used for packing and protecting goods while in storage, or during shipping.

values.label: Raw materials
values.comment: Inventory of raw materials used to manufacturefinished products.

values.label: Unfinished Products.
values.comment: Inventory of products that are incomplete and not ready for sale.

values.label: Work in progress (WIP)
values.comment: Inventory of unfinished items or componentscurrently in production.
